Adventure Status: Unstable 4 (12)
Date: Sunday Morning

I left Benji a list and Alex grabbed me by the hand and dragged me out of his friends abode back to where his car was parked. "Though you living with me does pose one problem." Alex said as he opened my door for me.

I grinned. "You mean the whole pick up drop off no sex till the third date thing?"

Alex nodded. "We'll have to define some rules. And uh, I only have one bed."

I bit my bottom lip as I leaned over to unlock his door and he slid in next to me. "Maybe we'll just have to be good."

Alex looked at me as I stretched what I could as I readjusted in the seat. He rolled his eyes. "I don't think you know how to behave yourself."

"What?" I said innocently. Though I could behave. I did it all the time. I just liked knowing he was looking, watching, and found me attractive. And not in the I want to own you, fuck you and leave you type of attraction that most Venatori looked at me like. "I can be good. I just like the way you look at me." I confessed.

Alex smirked. "I like looking at you. We won't make it to a first date you keep moving like that. Dressing like that."

"These are your clothes." I complained.

"Exactly. Do you know how fucking hot it is having you naked in my clothes?"

I laughed. "Naked in your clothes? Isn't that..."

"You know what I mean."

"I'll behave."

Alex pouted. "And if I don't want you to?"

"Now who is teasing who?" I asked.

"Only fair?"

I grinned. "I suppose. Let's go get my things. Take Rider to the coven and we can talk all about how this is going to work."

Q: Anything happen on their ride to the Venatori compound?
(1d20+0: [3]+0 = 3)
No

Q: anything happen once they get there?
(1d20+0: [13]+0 = 13)
Yes

Q: Are there people trying to hurt Rider?
(1d20+0: [13]+0 = 13)
Yes

Q: Do they think it's Nox?
(1d20+0: [6]+0 = 6)
No

Q: Is Rider giving off Therian vibes?
(1d20+0: [12]+0 = 12)
Yes, but Weakness, Candidate, Silence

Q: Did Rider shift?
(1d20+0: [2]+0 = 2)
No, and Blood, Bell, Noxious

We didn't really find a solution to our issue but we pulled up to the bunk house. It should have been quiet entrance but it wasn't -- a shouting crowd was not what I was expecting.

"That don't look good." Alex said.

"If I said, stay here you wouldn't listen would you?" I asked.

"Not a chance, lover."

I nodded. "That's what I thought, so I won't say it. Be careful and don't stand too close." I warned.

He looked at me strange. "Oh. Right?" He put his hands together and separated them violently. "Boom!"

Alex turned off the car and we got out. I didn't wait for him to open the door and Alex hung back a little as I walked up the stairs to the crowd in front of the door. I heard my twins voice loud and clear.

"I am not Damien and I will not put up with your fucking shit." He growled -- an actual growl, a low rumble in his throat that grew louder.

Rider's voice carried, the growl rumbled deep in my chest. Alex grabbed my elbow to keep me from the power he and all the other Venatori felt rippling from my brother.

"I'll be okay." I said walking up to my brother with a calm smile. The other Venatori looked at the two of us like they were seeing double. I gave them a smirk. "Didn't know I had a brother did you?"

(1d20: [6] = 6)
A Patch of Wildflowers Bloom Instantly

Q: Trace Contain Magic Rune on Rider's Shoulder (eased) (6)
(1d20: [10] = 10)
Success
Developer: PC Enabler
Endanger, Building, Question
(1d20: [15] = 15)

(1d20: [13] = 13)
Nearby Shadows Seem to Dance and Flicker

Flowers bloomed below us as I put my hand on Rider's shoulder and started to trace a rune on his shirt. His power subsided and the shadows nearby from the building and trees seemed to dance and flicker in the sunlight.

The Venatori looked at us, raised their preverbal pitchforks and rushed us.

Q: Does anyone stop the fight?
(1d20+0: [1]+0 = 1)
No, and Disciple, Rope, Few
